content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to update the code in "calculate_distance.py" with a valid API key, but received an error message saying "Invalid API key provided." I then attempted to run the command "calculate_distance.py" but received an error message saying it was an unknown command. I then wrote the updated code with the valid API key to the file "calculate_distance.py" using the "write_to_file" command.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "calculate_distance.py", "text": "\\n# Define the API key\\nAPI_KEY = \'YOUR_VALID_API_KEY\'\\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
